title: Definitions
context: [ยง606-13.5] Definitions. As used in this chapter, unless the context indicates otherwise: &ldquo;Certified shorthand reporter&rdquo; means a shorthand reporter certified by the Hawaii supreme court through the Hawaii board of certified shorthand reporters. &ldquo;Official court reporter&rdquo; means a certified shorthand reporter employed by the courts of the State to provide court reporting services. &ldquo;Private court reporter&rdquo; means a certified shorthand reporter who offers services on a freelance basis and who is not employed by the courts of the State. [L 1996, c 226, pt of ยง1]
